experiences.title: Front-End Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Alex's Drone Videography
workDescription: Engineered and maintained robust website hosting infrastructure by configuring domains, setting up servers, and implementing uptime monitoring, resulting in a seamless and highly reliable online experience.
Optimized website usability by utilizing JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3 to build a responsive and intuitive user interface.

Communicated closely with the client to gather requirements, provide regular progress updates, and incorporate feedback into the website's content and design, ensuring alignment with his vision and business objectives.
